front.title: Protocol Independent Multicast - Dense Mode (PIM-DM): Protocol Specification (Revised)

abstract.t: This document specifies Protocol Independent Multicast - Dense Mode (PIM-DM). PIM-DM is a multicast routing protocol that uses the underlying unicast routing information base to flood multicast datagrams to all multicast routers. Prune messages are used to prevent future messages from propagating to routers with no group membership information.
